title: Bloomberg's Larson on Apple's $14 Billion Back Tax Bill (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Larson on Apple's $14 Billion Back Tax Bill (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Matt Larson, Litigation Analyst at Bloomberg Intelligence, on Apple being ordered by the EU to pay as much as $14.5 billion in Irish back taxes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
